about_the_game:
Shattered Minds is an open-world visual novel where you step into the life of a young man gifted with an extraordinary power: the ability to control minds.

This newfound power turns your world upside down, offering you the chance to fulfill your deepest desires and achieve all your dreams. But your ambitions go far beyond that—you want to dominate the entire town, bringing its people and institutions under your complete control.

But there's a catch. A mighty power like yours never comes without a downside...

Open World

Explore an open world where each character goes about their daily routine.

It's up to you which quests you want to complete and which character you want to corrupt first.

Build your harem

Build the harem of your dreams! Command your girls as you see fit—have them generate resources, decide what they wear, chat with them, have sex with them, let them live with you or even impregnate them if you wish.

Every girl is unique

Each character in the game has a unique personality, their own story to uncover, and an individual quest line to explore.

Cracking each ones mind is different. However, with your power they all can be cracked!

Build your empire

Take control of buildings and let them generate resources for you. Some building even unlock new girls for you to interact with, expanding your opportunities and influence. Upgrade your buildings to boost their output and unlock even greater potential.

Sexy animations

Animated sex scenes in Shattered Minds run at 30 frames per second and in FullHD. Each animation has at least two camera angles. You can switch between them as often as you like!

Included features at the start of Early Access:

  • open world sandbox gameplay mixed with VN elements

  • quest log and inventory system

  • real estate mechanic: take over the town

  • 13 main girls to corrupt (and more to come) + side characters

  • 8 unique locations to discover (and more to come)

  • level up your character

  • minigames to earn money and XP

  • management part: manage your harem as well as you buildings

  • pregnancy system: impregnate your harem members!

Shattered Minds also includes plenty of animations, a licensed soundtrack, and atmospheric sound effects!

Get ready for a sexy adventure you won't soon forget!
